title: 04/23/2021 - HOUR 1 - Baker Mayfield Contract, Smart QB's and Chris Simms
itunes:title: 04/23/2021 - HOUR 1 - Baker Mayfield Contract, Smart QB's and Chris Simms
description:
Colin talks about Baker Mayfield's situation in Cleveland. He also says he doesn't need a QB who is too smart on his team. And NFL Analyst Chris Simms drops by.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
